Author: hotoutthekitchen
Text: ♥️ this has been the most supportive community I've ever found ♥️ for the past 10 years I've felt so isolated because I can't cope with everyday social situations involving food and eating. no one irl can understand the tiny niche things we all can rally around and I feel so comforted knowing I'm not alone here. Idk why reddit thinks destroying our support networks and pushing some monotonous passive hotline number is a good move. no one can gain when u tell mentally ill people that their thoughts need to be hidden and kept quiet
